comments: This course teaches a mix of strategy and accounting in the not-for-profit sector. Workload was decent. Expectations for assignments could have been a little better defined. Enjoyed the guest speaker series and the group projects.

Make sure you attend class even though the subject matter is a bit boring. I had some trouble because accounting isn\'t my major, but Professor Whatmore is very patient and willing to help. The tutorials for the assignments are really helpful and if he doesn\'t finish he makes sure to email everyone so that everyone understands. Really good person.
Please has anyone experienced this prof and offer any insights?
